00053 
00054 Range::Range(MasterClientPtr &master_client_ptr,
00055              const TableIdentifier *identifier, SchemaPtr &schema_ptr,
00056              const RangeSpec *range, const RangeState *state)
00057     : m_master_client_ptr(master_client_ptr), m_identifier(*identifier),
00058       m_schema(schema_ptr), m_maintenance_in_progress(false),
00059       m_revision(0), m_latest_revision(0),
00060       m_added_inserts(0), m_state(*state), m_error(Error::OK) {
00061   AccessGroup *ag;
00062 
00063   memset(m_added_deletes, 0, 3*sizeof(int64_t));
00064 
00065   if (m_state.soft_limit == 0 || m_state.soft_limit > Global::range_max_bytes)
00066     m_state.soft_limit = Global::range_max_bytes;
00067 
00068   m_start_row = range->start_row;
00069   m_end_row = range->end_row;
00070 
00071   m_name = format("%s[%s..%s]", identifier->name, range->start_row,
00072                   range->end_row);
00073 
00074   m_is_root = (m_identifier.id == 0 && *range->start_row == 0
00075       && !strcmp(range->end_row, Key::END_ROOT_ROW));
00076 
00077   m_column_family_vector.resize(m_schema->get_max_column_family_id() + 1);
00078 
00079   foreach(Schema::AccessGroup *sag, m_schema->get_access_groups()) {
00080     ag = new AccessGroup(identifier, m_schema, sag, range);
00081     m_access_group_map[sag->name] = ag;
00082     m_access_group_vector.push_back(ag);
00083 
00084     foreach(Schema::ColumnFamily *scf, sag->columns)
00085       m_column_family_vector[scf->id] = ag;
00086   }
00087 
00088   if (m_is_root) {
00089     MetadataRoot metadata(m_schema);
00090     load_cell_stores(&metadata);
00091   }
00092   else {
00093     MetadataNormal metadata(&m_identifier, m_end_row);
00094     load_cell_stores(&metadata);
00095   }
00096 
00097   HT_DEBUG_OUT << "Range object for " << m_name << " constructed\n"
00098                << *state << HT_END;
00099 }
00100 
00101 
00104 Range::~Range() {
00105   for (size_t i=0; i<m_access_group_vector.size(); i++)
00106     delete m_access_group_vector[i];
00107 }

00114 void Range::load_cell_stores(Metadata *metadata) {
00115   int error;
00116   AccessGroup *ag;
00117   CellStorePtr cellstore;
00118   uint32_t csid;
00119   const char *base, *ptr, *end;
00120   std::vector<String> csvec;
00121   String ag_name;
00122   String files;
00123   String file_str;
00124 
00125   metadata->reset_files_scan();
00126 
00127   while (metadata->get_next_files(ag_name, files)) {
00128     csvec.clear();
00129 
00130     if ((ag = m_access_group_map[ag_name]) == 0) {
00131       HT_ERRORF("Unrecognized access group name '%s' found in METADATA for "
00132                 "table '%s'", ag_name.c_str(), m_identifier.name);
00133       continue;
00134     }
00135 
00136     ptr = base = (const char *)files.c_str();
00137     end = base + strlen(base);
00138     while (ptr < end) {
00139 
00140       while (*ptr != ';' && ptr < end)
00141         ptr++;
00142 
00143       file_str = String(base, ptr-base);
00144       boost::trim(file_str);
00145 
00146       if (file_str[0] == '#')
00147         file_str = file_str.substr(1);
00148 
00149       if (file_str != "")
00150         csvec.push_back(file_str);
00151 
00152       ++ptr;
00153       base = ptr;
00154     }
00155 
00156     for (size_t i=0; i<csvec.size(); i++) {
00157 
00158       HT_INFOF("Loading CellStore %s", csvec[i].c_str());
00159 
00160       cellstore = new CellStoreV0(Global::dfs);
00161 
00162       if (!extract_csid_from_path(csvec[i], &csid)) {
00163         HT_ERRORF("Unable to extract cell store ID from path '%s'",
00164                   csvec[i].c_str());
00165         continue;
00166       }
00167       if ((error = cellstore->open(csvec[i].c_str(), m_start_row.c_str(),
00168           m_end_row.c_str())) != Error::OK) {
00169         // this should throw an exception
00170         HT_ERRORF("Problem opening cell store '%s', skipping...",
00171                   csvec[i].c_str());
00172         continue;
00173       }
00174       if ((error = cellstore->load_index()) != Error::OK) {
00175         // this should throw an exception
00176         HT_ERRORF("Problem loading index of cell store '%s', skipping...",
00177                   csvec[i].c_str());
00178         continue;
00179       }
00180 
00181       if (cellstore->get_revision() > m_latest_revision)
00182         m_latest_revision = cellstore->get_revision();
00183 
00184       ag->add_cell_store(cellstore, csid);
00185     }
00186 
00187   }
00188 
00189 }

00192 
00195 bool Range::extract_csid_from_path(String &path, uint32_t *csidp) {
00196   const char *base;
00197 
00198   if ((base = strrchr(path.c_str(), '/')) == 0 || strncmp(base, "/cs", 3))
00199     *csidp = 0;
00200   else
00201     *csidp = atoi(base+3);
00202 
00203   return true;
00204 }

00206 
00209 int Range::add(const Key &key, const ByteString value) {
00210   HT_DEBUG_OUT <<"key="<< key <<" value='";
00211     const uint8_t *p;
00212     size_t len = value.decode_length(&p);
00213     _out_ << format_bytes(20, p, len) <<"'"<< HT_END;
00214 
00215   if (m_error)
00216     return m_error;
00217 
00218   if (key.column_family_code >= m_column_family_vector.size()) {
00219     HT_ERROR_OUT <<"Bad column family ("<< (int)key.column_family_code <<") in "
00220         << m_identifier << HT_END;
00221     return Error::RANGESERVER_INVALID_COLUMNFAMILY;
00222   }
00223 
00224   if (key.flag == FLAG_DELETE_ROW) {
00225     for (AccessGroupMap::iterator iter = m_access_group_map.begin();
00226          iter != m_access_group_map.end(); ++iter)
00227       (*iter).second->add(key, value);
00228   }
00229   else
00230     m_column_family_vector[key.column_family_code]->add(key, value);
00231 
00232   if (key.flag == FLAG_INSERT)
00233     m_added_inserts++;
00234   else
00235     m_added_deletes[key.flag]++;
00236 
00237   if (key.revision > m_revision)
00238     m_revision = key.revision;
00239 
00240   return Error::OK;
00241 }

00244 
00245 CellListScanner *Range::create_scanner(ScanContextPtr &scan_ctx) {
00246   bool return_deletes = scan_ctx->spec ? scan_ctx->spec->return_deletes : false;
00247   MergeScanner *mscanner = new MergeScanner(scan_ctx, return_deletes);
00248 
00249   for (AccessGroupMap::iterator iter = m_access_group_map.begin();
00250        iter != m_access_group_map.end(); ++iter) {
00251     if ((*iter).second->include_in_scan(scan_ctx))
00252       mscanner->add_scanner((*iter).second->create_scanner(scan_ctx));
00253   }
00254   return mscanner;
00255 }

00257 
00258 uint64_t Range::disk_usage() {
00259   uint64_t usage = 0;
00260   for (size_t i=0; i<m_access_group_vector.size(); i++)
00261     usage += m_access_group_vector[i]->disk_usage();
00262   return usage;
00263 }

00270 void
00271 Range::get_compaction_priority_data(
00272     CompactionPriorityData &priority_data_vector) {
00273   size_t next_slot = priority_data_vector.size();
00274 
00275   priority_data_vector.resize(priority_data_vector.size()
00276                               + m_access_group_vector.size());
00277 
00278   for (size_t i=0; i<m_access_group_vector.size(); i++) {
00279     m_access_group_vector[i]->get_compaction_priority_data(
00280         priority_data_vector[next_slot]);
00281     next_slot++;
00282   }
00283 }

00286 void Range::split() {
00287   String old_start_row;
00288 
00289   HT_ASSERT(m_maintenance_in_progress);
00290   HT_ASSERT(!m_is_root);
00291 
00292   try {
00293 
00294     switch (m_state.state) {
00295 
00296     case (RangeState::STEADY):
00297       split_install_log();
00298 
00299     case (RangeState::SPLIT_LOG_INSTALLED):
00300       split_compact_and_shrink();
00301 
00302     case (RangeState::SPLIT_SHRUNK):
00303       split_notify_master();
00304 
00305     }
00306 
00307   }
00308   catch (Exception &e) {
00309     m_maintenance_in_progress = false;
00310     throw;
00311   }
00312 
00313   HT_INFOF("Split Complete.  New Range end_row=%s", m_start_row.c_str());
00314 
00315   m_maintenance_in_progress = false;
00316 }

00319 
00322 void Range::split_install_log() {
00323   std::vector<String> split_rows;
00324   char md5DigestStr[33];
00325 
00326   for (size_t i=0; i<m_access_group_vector.size(); i++)
00327     m_access_group_vector[i]->get_split_rows(split_rows, false);
00328 
00333   if (split_rows.size() < m_access_group_vector.size()) {
00334     for (size_t i=0; i<m_access_group_vector.size(); i++)
00335       m_access_group_vector[i]->get_split_rows(split_rows, true);
00336   }
00337   sort(split_rows.begin(), split_rows.end());
00338 
00353   if (split_rows.size() > 0) {
00354     ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00355     m_split_row = split_rows[split_rows.size()/2];
00356     if (m_split_row < m_start_row || m_split_row >= m_end_row) {
00357       split_rows.clear();
00358       for (size_t i=0; i<m_access_group_vector.size(); i++)
00359         m_access_group_vector[i]->get_cached_rows(split_rows);
00360       if (split_rows.size() > 0) {
00361         sort(split_rows.begin(), split_rows.end());
00362         m_split_row = split_rows[split_rows.size()/2];
00363         if (m_split_row < m_start_row || m_split_row >= m_end_row) {
00364           m_error = Error::RANGESERVER_ROW_OVERFLOW;
00365           HT_THROWF(Error::RANGESERVER_ROW_OVERFLOW,
00366                     "Unable to determine split row for range %s[%s..%s]",
00367                     m_identifier.name, m_start_row.c_str(), m_end_row.c_str());
00368         }
00369       }
00370       else {
00371         m_error = Error::RANGESERVER_ROW_OVERFLOW;
00372         HT_THROWF(Error::RANGESERVER_ROW_OVERFLOW,
00373                   "Unable to determine split row for range %s[%s..%s]",
00374                    m_identifier.name, m_start_row.c_str(), m_end_row.c_str());
00375       }
00376     }
00377   }
00378   else {
00379     m_error = Error::RANGESERVER_ROW_OVERFLOW;
00380     HT_THROWF(Error::RANGESERVER_ROW_OVERFLOW,
00381               "Unable to determine split row for range %s[%s..%s]",
00382               m_identifier.name, m_start_row.c_str(), m_end_row.c_str());
00383   }
00384 
00385   m_state.set_split_point(m_split_row);
00386 
00390   md5_string(m_state.split_point, md5DigestStr);
00391   md5DigestStr[24] = 0;
00392   m_state.set_transfer_log(Global::log_dir + "/" + md5DigestStr);
00393 
00394   // Create transfer log dir
00395   try {
00396     Global::log_dfs->rmdir(m_state.transfer_log);
00397     Global::log_dfs->mkdirs(m_state.transfer_log);
00398   }
00399   catch (Exception &e) {
00400     HT_ERRORF("Problem creating log directory '%s': %s",
00401               m_state.transfer_log, e.what());
00402     HT_ABORT;
00403   }
00404 
00408   {
00409     RangeUpdateBarrier::ScopedActivator block_updates(m_update_barrier);
00410     ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00411     for (size_t i=0; i<m_access_group_vector.size(); i++)
00412       m_access_group_vector[i]->initiate_compaction();
00413     m_split_log_ptr = new CommitLog(Global::dfs, m_state.transfer_log);
00414   }
00415 
00419   m_state.state = RangeState::SPLIT_LOG_INSTALLED;
00420   for (int i=0; true; i++) {
00421     try {
00422       Global::range_log->log_split_start(m_identifier,
00423           RangeSpec(m_start_row.c_str(), m_end_row.c_str()),
00424           RangeSpec(m_start_row.c_str(), m_state.split_point), m_state);
00425       break;
00426     }
00427     catch (Exception &e) {
00428       if (i<3) {
00429         HT_ERRORF("%s - %s", Error::get_text(e.code()), e.what());
00430         poll(0, 0, 5000);
00431         continue;
00432       }
00433       HT_ERRORF("Problem writing SPLIT_LOG_INSTALLED meta log entry for %s "
00434                 "split-point='%s'", m_name.c_str(), m_state.split_point);
00435       HT_FATAL_OUT << e << HT_END;
00436     }
00437   }
00438 
00439   if (Global::crash_test)
00440     Global::crash_test->maybe_crash("split-1");
00441 
00442 }

00445 
00449 void Range::split_compact_and_shrink() {
00450   int error;
00451   String old_start_row = m_start_row;
00452 
00456   {
00457     for (size_t i=0; i<m_access_group_vector.size(); i++)
00458       m_access_group_vector[i]->run_compaction(true);
00459   }
00460 
00461   try {
00462     String files;
00463     String metadata_key_str;
00464     KeySpec key;
00465 
00466     TableMutatorPtr mutator_ptr = Global::metadata_table_ptr->create_mutator();
00467 
00471     metadata_key_str = String("") + (uint32_t)m_identifier.id + ":" + m_end_row;
00472     key.row = metadata_key_str.c_str();
00473     key.row_len = metadata_key_str.length();
00474     key.column_qualifier = 0;
00475     key.column_qualifier_len = 0;
00476     key.column_family = "StartRow";
00477     mutator_ptr->set(key, (uint8_t *)m_state.split_point,
00478                      strlen(m_state.split_point));
00479 
00483     metadata_key_str = format("%u:%s", m_identifier.id, m_state.split_point);
00484     key.row = metadata_key_str.c_str();
00485     key.row_len = metadata_key_str.length();
00486     key.column_qualifier = 0;
00487     key.column_qualifier_len = 0;
00488 
00489     key.column_family = "StartRow";
00490     mutator_ptr->set(key, old_start_row.c_str(), old_start_row.length());
00491 
00492     key.column_family = "Files";
00493     for (size_t i=0; i<m_access_group_vector.size(); i++) {
00494       key.column_qualifier = m_access_group_vector[i]->get_name();
00495       key.column_qualifier_len = strlen(m_access_group_vector[i]->get_name());
00496       m_access_group_vector[i]->get_files(files);
00497       mutator_ptr->set(key, (uint8_t *)files.c_str(), files.length());
00498     }
00499 
00500     mutator_ptr->flush();
00501 
00502   }
00503   catch (Hypertable::Exception &e) {
00504     // TODO: propagate exception
00505     HT_ERRORF("Problem updating ROOT METADATA range (new=%s, existing=%s) - %s",
00506         m_state.split_point, m_end_row.c_str(), Error::get_text(e.code()));
00507     // need to unblock updates and then return error
00508     HT_ABORT;
00509   }
00510 
00515   {
00516     RangeUpdateBarrier::ScopedActivator block_updates(m_update_barrier);
00517     ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00518 
00519     // Shrink access groups
00520     m_start_row = m_state.split_point;
00521     m_name = String(m_identifier.name) + "[" + m_start_row + ".." + m_end_row
00522              + "]";
00523     m_split_row = "";
00524     for (size_t i=0; i<m_access_group_vector.size(); i++)
00525       m_access_group_vector[i]->shrink(m_start_row);
00526 
00527     // Close and uninstall split log
00528     if ((error = m_split_log_ptr->close()) != Error::OK) {
00529       HT_ERRORF("Problem closing split log '%s' - %s",
00530           m_split_log_ptr->get_log_dir().c_str(), Error::get_text(error));
00531     }
00532     m_split_log_ptr = 0;
00533   }
00534 
00538   m_state.state = RangeState::SPLIT_SHRUNK;
00539   m_state.timestamp = 0;
00540   m_state.set_old_start_row(old_start_row);
00541   m_state.clear_split_point();
00542 
00543   for (int i=0; true; i++) {
00544     try {
00545       Global::range_log->log_split_shrunk(m_identifier,
00546           RangeSpec(m_start_row.c_str(), m_end_row.c_str()), m_state);
00547       break;
00548     }
00549     catch (Exception &e) {
00550       if (i<3) {
00551         HT_ERRORF("%s - %s", Error::get_text(e.code()), e.what());
00552         poll(0, 0, 5000);
00553         continue;
00554       }
00555       HT_ERRORF("Problem writing SPLIT_SHRUNK meta log entry for %s "
00556                 "split-point='%s'", m_name.c_str(), m_state.split_point);
00557       HT_FATAL_OUT << e << HT_END;
00558     }
00559   }
00560 
00561   if (Global::crash_test)
00562     Global::crash_test->maybe_crash("split-2");
00563 
00564 }
00565 
00566 
00570 void Range::split_notify_master() {
00571   int error;
00572   RangeSpec range;
00573   uint64_t soft_limit = m_state.soft_limit;
00574 
00575   range.start_row = m_state.old_start_row;
00576   range.end_row = m_start_row.c_str();
00577 
00578   // update the latest generation, this should probably be protected
00579   m_identifier.generation = m_schema->get_generation();
00580 
00581   HT_INFOF("Reporting newly split off range %s[%s..%s] to Master",
00582            m_identifier.name, range.start_row, range.end_row);
00583 
00584   if (soft_limit < Global::range_max_bytes) {
00585     soft_limit *= 2;
00586     if (soft_limit > Global::range_max_bytes)
00587       soft_limit = Global::range_max_bytes;
00588   }
00589 
00590   if ((error = m_master_client_ptr->report_split(&m_identifier, range,
00591       m_state.transfer_log, soft_limit)) != Error::OK) {
00592     HT_THROWF(error, "Problem reporting split (table=%s, start_row=%s, "
00593               "end_row=%s) to master.", m_identifier.name, range.start_row,
00594               range.end_row);
00595   }
00596 
00602   if (Global::crash_test)
00603     Global::crash_test->maybe_crash("split-3");
00604 
00605   m_state.soft_limit = soft_limit;
00606 
00610   m_state.state = RangeState::STEADY;
00611   m_state.clear_transfer_log();
00612   m_state.clear_old_start_row();
00613 
00614   for (int i=0; true; i++) {
00615     try {
00616       Global::range_log->log_split_done(m_identifier,
00617           RangeSpec(m_start_row.c_str(), m_end_row.c_str()));
00618       break;
00619     }
00620     catch (Exception &e) {
00621       if (i<2) {
00622         HT_ERRORF("%s - %s", Error::get_text(e.code()), e.what());
00623         poll(0, 0, 5000);
00624         continue;
00625       }
00626       HT_ERRORF("Problem writing SPLIT_DONE meta log entry for %s "
00627                 "split-point='%s'", m_name.c_str(), m_state.split_point);
00628       HT_FATAL_OUT << e << HT_END;
00629     }
00630   }
00631 
00632 }
00633 
00634 
00635 void Range::compact(bool major) {
00636   run_compaction(major);
00637   m_maintenance_in_progress = false;
00638 }
00639 
00640 
00641 void Range::run_compaction(bool major) {
00642 
00643   {
00644     RangeUpdateBarrier::ScopedActivator block_updates(m_update_barrier);
00645     ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00646     for (size_t i=0; i<m_access_group_vector.size(); i++) {
00647       if (major || m_access_group_vector[i]->needs_compaction())
00648         m_access_group_vector[i]->initiate_compaction();
00649     }
00650   }
00651 
00652   for (size_t i=0; i<m_access_group_vector.size(); i++)
00653     m_access_group_vector[i]->run_compaction(major);
00654 }
00655 
00656 
00657 void Range::post_replay() {
00658   if (m_state.state == RangeState::SPLIT_LOG_INSTALLED) {
00659     CommitLogReaderPtr commit_log_reader_ptr =
00660         new CommitLogReader(Global::dfs, m_state.transfer_log);
00661     replay_transfer_log(commit_log_reader_ptr.get());
00662     commit_log_reader_ptr = 0;
00663 
00664     // re-initiate compaction
00665     for (size_t i=0; i<m_access_group_vector.size(); i++)
00666       m_access_group_vector[i]->initiate_compaction();
00667 
00668     m_split_log_ptr = new CommitLog(Global::dfs, m_state.transfer_log);
00669     m_split_row = m_state.split_point;
00670     HT_INFOF("Restored range state to SPLIT_LOG_INSTALLED (split point='%s' "
00671              "split log='%s')", m_state.split_point, m_state.transfer_log);
00672   }
00673 }

00675 
00676 void Range::dump_stats() {
00677   String range_str = (String)m_identifier.name + "[" + m_start_row + ".."
00678                       + m_end_row + "]";
00679   uint64_t collisions = 0;
00680   uint64_t cached = 0;
00681   for (size_t i=0; i<m_access_group_vector.size(); i++) {
00682     collisions += m_access_group_vector[i]->get_collision_count();
00683     cached += m_access_group_vector[i]->get_cached_count();
00684   }
00685   cout << "STAT\t" << range_str << "\tadded inserts\t" << m_added_inserts
00686        << endl;
00687   cout << "STAT\t" << range_str << "\tadded row deletes\t" << m_added_deletes[0]
00688        << endl;
00689   cout << "STAT\t" << range_str << "\tadded cf deletes\t" << m_added_deletes[1]
00690        << endl;
00691   cout << "STAT\t" << range_str << "\tadded cell deletes\t"
00692        << m_added_deletes[2] << endl;
00693   cout << "STAT\t" << range_str << "\tadded total\t"
00694        << (m_added_inserts + m_added_deletes[0] + m_added_deletes[1]
00695            + m_added_deletes[2]) << endl;
00696   cout << "STAT\t" << range_str << "\tcollisions\t" << collisions << endl;
00697   cout << "STAT\t" << range_str << "\tcached\t" << cached << endl;
00698   cout << flush;
00699 }
00700 
00701 void Range::get_statistics(RangeStat *stat) {
00702   uint64_t collisions = 0;
00703   uint64_t cached = 0;
00704   uint64_t disk_usage = 0;
00705   uint64_t memory_usage = 0;
00706 
00707   stat->added_inserts = m_added_inserts;
00708   stat->added_deletes[0] = m_added_deletes[0];
00709   stat->added_deletes[1] = m_added_deletes[1];
00710   stat->added_deletes[2] = m_added_deletes[2];
00711 
00712   for (size_t i=0; i<m_access_group_vector.size(); i++) {
00713     collisions += m_access_group_vector[i]->get_collision_count();
00714     cached += m_access_group_vector[i]->get_cached_count();
00715     disk_usage += m_access_group_vector[i]->disk_usage();
00716     memory_usage += m_access_group_vector[i]->memory_usage();
00717   }
00718 
00719   stat->collided_cells = collisions;
00720   stat->cached_cells = cached;
00721   stat->disk_usage = disk_usage;
00722   stat->memory_usage = memory_usage;
00723 
00724 
00725 
00726   {
00727     ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00728 
00729     stat->table_identifier = m_identifier;
00730 
00731     RangeSpec spec;
00732     // these may change during a shrink
00733     spec.start_row = m_start_row.c_str();
00734     spec.end_row = m_end_row.c_str();
00735 
00736     stat->range_spec = spec;
00737   }
00738 }
00739 
00740 
00741 void Range::lock() {
00742   for (AccessGroupMap::iterator iter = m_access_group_map.begin();
00743        iter != m_access_group_map.end(); ++iter)
00744     (*iter).second->lock();
00745   m_revision = 0;
00746 }
00747 
00748 
00749 void Range::unlock() {
00750 
00751   {
00752     ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00753     if (m_revision > m_latest_revision)
00754       m_latest_revision = m_revision;
00755   }
00756 
00757   for (AccessGroupMap::iterator iter = m_access_group_map.begin();
00758        iter != m_access_group_map.end(); ++iter)
00759     (*iter).second->unlock();
00760 }
00761 
00762 
00763 
00766 void Range::replay_transfer_log(CommitLogReader *commit_log_reader) {
00767   BlockCompressionHeaderCommitLog header;
00768   const uint8_t *base, *ptr, *end;
00769   size_t len;
00770   ByteString key, value;
00771   Key key_comps;
00772   size_t nblocks = 0;
00773   size_t count = 0;
00774   TableIdentifier table_id;
00775 
00776   m_revision = 0;
00777 
00778   try {
00779 
00780     while (commit_log_reader->next(&base, &len, &header)) {
00781 
00782       ptr = base;
00783       end = base + len;
00784 
00785       table_id.decode(&ptr, &len);
00786 
00787       if (strcmp(m_identifier.name, table_id.name))
00788         HT_THROWF(Error::RANGESERVER_CORRUPT_COMMIT_LOG,
00789                   "Table name mis-match in split log replay \"%s\" != \"%s\"",
00790                   m_identifier.name, table_id.name);
00791 
00792       while (ptr < end) {
00793         key.ptr = (uint8_t *)ptr;
00794         key_comps.load(key);
00795         ptr += key_comps.length;
00796         value.ptr = (uint8_t *)ptr;
00797         ptr += value.length();
00798         add(key_comps, value);
00799         count++;
00800       }
00801       nblocks++;
00802     }
00803 
00804     if (m_revision > m_latest_revision)
00805       m_latest_revision = m_revision;
00806 
00807     {
00808       ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00809       HT_INFOF("Replayed %d updates (%d blocks) from split log '%s' into "
00810                "%s[%s..%s]", (int)count, (int)nblocks,
00811                commit_log_reader->get_log_dir().c_str(),
00812                m_identifier.name, m_start_row.c_str(), m_end_row.c_str());
00813     }
00814 
00815     m_added_inserts = 0;
00816     memset(m_added_deletes, 0, 3*sizeof(int64_t));
00817 
00818   }
00819   catch (Hypertable::Exception &e) {
00820     HT_ERRORF("Problem replaying split log - %s '%s'",
00821               Error::get_text(e.code()), e.what());
00822     if (m_revision > m_latest_revision)
00823       m_latest_revision = m_revision;
00824     throw;
00825   }
00826 }
00827 
00828 
00829 
00832 int64_t Range::get_scan_revision() {
00833   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00834   return m_latest_revision;
00835 }
